channel.title: Strings are Lists :: Introduction to Python
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Throughout this course, we’ve seen several different ways to work with strings. In Python, just like in many other programming languages, it is possible to treat strings as a list of individual characters. Because of this, we can write many useful programs that use and manipulate strings in a variety of ways. Let’s look at one quick example program that can manipulate strings just like a list!
